name: linter
author: steelbrain
description: A Base Linter with Cow Powers

scripts.test: npm run tsc.build && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.tsc.types: (tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly || echo done) && (shx cp -r ./lib/types dist && shx rm -rf ./dist/types/linter-ui-default)
scripts.tsc.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc --watch -p lib/tsconfig.json || echo done
scripts.tsc.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p lib/tsconfig.json || echo done
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c -w
scripts.build: npm run tsc.types && npm run build.bundle
scripts.prepare: npm run get.ui-types && npm run clean && npm run build

lintPreviewTabs.description: Lint tabs while they are still in preview status

lintOnOpen.title: Lint on Open
lintOnOpen.description: Lint files automatically when they are opened

lintOnChange.title: Lint on Change
lintOnChange.description: Lint files while typing, without the need to save (only for supported providers)

lintOnChangeInterval.title: Lint on Change Interval
lintOnChangeInterval.description: Interval at which linting is done as you type (in ms)
